column2: "I was waiting."
"No, that's not quite it. Perhaps I was making you wait."
"My name is Xion."
"I know that it will require some time before you trust me."
"And yet, I want you to hear the conclusion I've arrived at after an eternity of thinking."
"I can only observe. I will not attempt to interfere, as I cannot."
"However, if nothing is done, then everything will be lost."
"That is why I have calculated the endless possibilities and cataloged them here."
"This Matter Board categorizes chance encounters and makes them inevitable."
"I can only observe; I cannot guide you. But, perhaps, this Matter Board can."
"I pray the woeful path I have taken will help show you the way."
"I know that I do not have your trust or confidence. That is only logical."
"And yet, still I put my trust in you."
"I am nowhere, and yet, everywhere. If you have any questions, I will listen."
"There is something that I must tell you. There has been a fluctuation."
"Your efforts have begun to take effect. New possibilities are coming into existence."
"This is likely an affront to destiny."
"And yet, this is precisely the desired result."
"I must apologize."
"It must be hard to comprehend it, given all this vagueness."
"To get to the point, there is something I must request of you. "
"Please proceed to the planet Naberius."
"I cannot tell you the reason."
"The answer lies only in the future. I can only observe, nothing more."

"Hmm, I see.
That was the encounter between
<%me> and Xion."

"相変わらず、言ってること
さっぱり意味不明だねー。
でも、わたしのときよりはましかな？"

"わたしもさ、創世器を通じて
ちょこちょこ話しかけられたよ。
ずっと後悔してる感じだったかな。"

"今思えば、あれはわたしに対して
謝罪してたのかもな、って思うんだ。
未来や結末が見えているから、さ。"

"……このとき、貴方に話しかけた
シオンも、自身の結末までは
見えていたんだと思うよ。"

"そして、貴方を導くために
「マターボード」を渡したってわけだ。
ナベリウスに向かえってのもその一環。"
"それは、「何か」を成し遂げるため。"

"その「何か」が、きっとシオンの
「後悔」に繋がるものなんだろうけど
ここまでじゃ、まだ見えてこないかな。"
